mapper.select: SELECT v.code, v.name, v.middlepart, v.start, v.end, m.name as middleName FROM vote v join middlepart m ON v.middlepart = m.code WHERE NOW() BETWEEN v.start AND v.end
mapper.insert: insert into vote(name, middlepart, start, end) values(#{name}, #{middlepart}, #{start}, #{end});
mapper.select: select v.* from vote v, middlepart mp, area a, voter vr where 1 and v.middlepart=mp.code and mp.areaCode=a.areacode and a.areacode=vr.areacode and vr.code = #{votercode} and not exists (select 'X' from votetf vtf where v.code = vtf.votecode and vr.code = vtf.votercode) AND NOW() BETWEEN v.start AND v.end union select * from vote v where v.middlepart='D_DAESEON' AND not exists (select 'X' from votetf vtf WHERE v.code = vtf.votecode and vtf.votercode = #{votercode}) AND NOW() BETWEEN v.start AND v.end
